The benefits of using UniTracks

UniTracks is an e-learning site which provides resources for improving digital skills in computer use, programming and more

Flexibility

UniTracks is built around your schedule and can be used to learn digital skills at a time that suits you.

Access anywhere

Access this e-learning plaform anywhere at anytime. This site has been optimised for desktop, tablet and mobile devices.

Learn skills wanted by employers

Learn digital skills such as software use, best IT practises and more which are wanted by employers.

Complete quizzes to test knowledge

Test your knowledge by completing interactive quizzes at the end of each skillset module

Learn new digital skills

UniTracks offers many skillset modules which can help improve your digital skills

  • Programing Concepts
  • Learn about basic programming concepts
  • Software Use
  • Gain knowledge about using various IT software
  • Problem-solving skills
  • Break down complex problem into simple tasks
  • IT etiquette
  • Understand how to write professional emails

How to use UniTracks

Follow the steps below to get the most out of this platform

1

Sign Up

Use a valid email address and create a unique password to create an UniTracks account to access the skillset modules

2

Access different skillset tracks

From programming, software use, IT etiquette and problem-solving concepts, UniTracks provides a range of IT modules

3

Complete tests and quizzes

Each skillset module ends with a quiz which tests your knowledge about the concepts covered within the module

4

Use the resource list

A resource list is provided throughout each module which help to further explain a particular concept within the module
